title: Migration balance in Belgium 2010 to 2018
summary: Overall Migration balance has decreased over the Year.
Migration balance is slightly decreasing from 2010 to 2012, and finally roughly increasing from 2012 to 2014.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
The highest Migration balance, of value 79446.0 was reached at Year 2010
Minimum Migration balance about 34843.0 was reached at Year 2013
